About our events

Join our vibrant community through a variety of inclusive events designed for autistic expats and their families. Whether you're into books, nature walks, or fun-filled game nights, we have something for everyone.

OBA Library

Book Club

Reading: Unmasking Autism, by Devon Price

Join us for thoughtful discussions and engaging conversations about a great book.

Het Twiske

City Trip

The Hague & Madurodam
